glsa.title: GraphicsMagick: Multiple Vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GraphicsMagick, the worst of which could lead to arbitrary code execution.

background.p: GraphicsMagick is a collection of tools and libraries which support reading, writing, and manipulating images in many major formats.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GraphicsMagick. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GraphicsMagick users should upgrade to the latest version:
